description:
**Fix Overview**:

To address the Windows Telephony Service remote code execution vulnerability (CVE-2024-43628), ensure that relevant updates are applied as follows:

1. Identify your Windows version from the list of affected builds.
2. Download and install the respective KB updates:
   - For Windows 11 Version 24H2: [KB5046617](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5046617)
   - For Windows 11 Version 23H2: [KB5046633](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5046633)
   - For Windows 10 Version 21H2: [KB5046613](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5046613)
   - For Windows 10: [KB5046665](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5046665)
3. Restart your system after installation to apply the updates.

**Details**:
These updates rectify integer overflow or wraparound issues that could lead to remote code execution. Users should verify the update packages corresponding to their system's build number and perform necessary installations. 

**Preconditions**:
- Ensure the system is running a supported version of Windows.
- Backup critical data before proceeding with the update installation.
